func.title: GetPlrViewMode

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose view mode you want to determine.

func.desc:
Determines the current view mode of a player. The function returns the following values:
C4PVM_Cursor = 0: Cursor - The player view follows the currently selected clonk (see GetCursor, SetViewCursor).
C4PVM_Target = 1: Target - The player view follows the object set by SetPlrView. Also see GetPlrView.
C4PVM_Scrolling = 2: Scroll - The player is scrolling his view using the mouse.
func.remark: As mouse scrolling behaviour differs on every computer, this function always returns -1 whenever in Record, Replay, or network game mode.
In 9.0 OC this function was discontinued, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer and GetViewMode().
